# Nokia 7750 SR OS Basic Configuration
# TiMOS-B-22.10.R4

configure
    system
        name "SR-Router-1"
        snmp
            admin-state enable
        exit
        time
            ntp
                server 10.10.10.1
                admin-state enable
            exit
        exit
        security
            ssh
                admin-state enable
            exit
        exit
    exit
    router "Base"
        interface "system"
            address 10.10.10.100/32
        exit
        interface "to-peer-1"
            address 192.168.1.1/30
            port 1/1/1
            description "Link to PE-Router-2"
        exit
        interface "to-peer-2"
            address 192.168.2.1/30
            port 1/1/2
            description "Link to PE-Router-3"
        exit
    exit
    port 1/1/1
        admin-state enable
        description "To-PE-Router-2"
        ethernet
            mode network
        exit
    exit
    port 1/1/2
        admin-state enable
        description "To-PE-Router-3"
        ethernet
            mode network
        exit
    exit
exit
